title: Exclude print view from screenshot feature

requirements.text: Ensure the print view page (PrintViewPage.tsx) does not display or trigger any screenshot functionality when rendering bills
acceptanceCriteria: The print view page renders bills in classic text format only
No screenshot capture or image generation occurs on the print view route
Bills displayed for printing maintain the traditional receipt-style layout with proper formatting

constraints: Do not modify the classic receipt rendering logic in PrintBill.tsx
Preserve the existing print-specific CSS styling in index.css
nonGoals: Adding new screenshot functionality elsewhere in the app
Changing the bill format or layout styling
Modifying how bills are saved or loaded from storage
